TopicTitle: 40 hours into this game, I finally landed on the Mun

Articles.Content:
I killed about 18 adorable Kerbals in the process... but I finally did it!

This is an accurate representation of what happened in my mind during that process.

The video is completely real, I did not stage any of the events.

The audio is just me being weird.

bet you were a happy person when you touched down on the Mun

it is always a great feeling

with that slope and sideways movement... was expecting an explosion

good job on that landing

bet you were a happy person when you touched down on the Mun

it is always a great feeling

with that slope and sideways movement... was expecting an explosion

good job on that landing

Thanks! Yeah, I was extremely happy. The video shows my genuine reaction (even if it is dramatized).

Truthfully, this game has given me some of the most thrilling moments I've ever had on a virtual level. The first time I ever successfully launched a rocket that made it into orbit, I nearly cried.
